title: Please can you sign petition for Anna (big4 Employee, a Chartered Accountant & most importantly a daughter) and help every employee out there?
selftext: Please can you help in seeking justice for Anna, for every Employee? Please sign the petition (refer to the comment section)
comments: Petition Link - [Justice for Anna, for an employee](https://www.change.org/p/justice-for-anna-end-corporate-slavery-demand-the-indian-employees-protection-act)
